All Classes

Class
Description
AvailableCryptoList
This class stores available crpytocoin list.
Broker
This class represents a Broker object.
BrokerController
This class is coded to link BrokerModel and BrokerTableView classes in Controller system.
BrokerData
This class represents a Broker.
BrokerDataFetcher
This class helps the broker to fetch the data.
BrokerModel
This class represents the BrokerModel in the Model system.
BrokerTableView
Singleton class representing the Broker Table view in the main UI.
Coin
This class represents a coin object.
DataFetcher
This class fetches data for coin prices by using a website called coingecko.
LoginController
This class is coded to link LoginModel and LoginView classes in Controller system.
LoginModel
This class is used for the authentication of the users.
LoginView
Singleton class representing the LoginView and extending from JFrame.
MainUI
Singleton class for the MainUI extends JFrame and implements UpdateMainView interface.
RequestAuthentication
Interface for requesting user authentication from the controller.
RequestBrokerUpdate
Interface for requesting BrokerController tasks.
RequestTrade
Interface for requesting a new trade.
RequestUserLogin
Interface provided for authenticating at login.
StartProgram
Class to start the program.
Strategy
 
TableCellListener
 
TradeController
This class is coded to link TradeModel and TradeView classes in Controller system.
TradeGraphView
Singleton class representing the GraphView.
TradeModel
This class represents the TradeModel.
TradeReceipt
This class represents a Trade Receipt that is created upon performing a trade.
TradeReceiptsDatabase
This class stores the trade receipts.
TradeTableView
Singleton class representing the TradeTable view extending JPanel.
TradeView
Singleton class representing the main trade view extending JPanel and implementing the UpdateTradeView and ActionListener interfaces.
TradingStrategy
This class represents a TradingStrategy that a broker uses.
TradingStrategyA
This class represents Trading Strategy A that we will use to perform a trade.
TradingStrategyB
This class represents Trading Strategy B that we will use to perform a trade.
TradingStrategyC
This class represents Trading Strategy C that we will use to perform a trade.
TradingStrategyD
This class represents Trading Strategy D that we will use to perform a trade.
TradingStrategyFactory
 
UpdateBrokerData
Interface provided for updating the broker database.
UpdateBrokerModel
Interface for updating the broker model.
UpdateBrokerTableView
Interface for interacting with the BrokerTableView.
UpdateLoginView
Interface providing methods to be implemented by the LoginView class for updating the user on login authentication procedures.
UpdateMainView
Interface for updating the MainUI view.
UpdateTradeModel
Interface for updating the TradeModel.
UpdateTradeReceipts
Interface for updating the trade receipt database.
UpdateTradeView
Interface for interacting with the TradeView provides the displayTradeView and notifyFailTrade methods.
